channel.title: [Refractored] Cache & Webclient Error [Refractored]
channel.description:
Hey,
1.) How do I zip the Cache correctly on a galkons refractored client? I'm having trouble I've made the JAR but the cache isn't zipped properly. Because it says 'requesting title screen'. So can someone please tell me how to zip it properly.
2.) I'm using 'Googles' cache downloader and it says 'You must download the cache manually'. I'm confused, and just want a working webclient, can anyone please help me.
www.survivalpkz.com/client/Cache.zip There is the link to my cache download can someone download it and zip it correctly and re-upload it for me please.
Also, can someone give me a working CacheDownloader that will always work.
Thanks.

item.title: [Refractored] Cache & Webclient Error [Refractored]
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
